movies.title: Kokowääh
movies.plot: Henry is a handsome screenwriter who is trying to win the heart of the woman he truly loves. His plans are interrupted when he finds Magdalena, a little girl at his house.
movies.simplePlot: Henry is a handsome screenwriter who is trying to win the heart of the woman he truly loves. His plans are interrupted when he finds Magdalena, a little girl at his house.

biography.bio: Numan Acar was born on October 7, 1974 in Kozoglu, Kelkit District, Turkey. He is an actor and producer, known for Homeland (2011), Prison Break: Sequel (2017) and The Great Wall (2016).
biography.name: Numan Acar

biography.bio: Meret Becker was born on January 15, 1969 in Bremen, Germany. She is an actress and composer, known for Munich (2005), Kokowääh (2011) and Wetlands (2013). She was previously married to Alexander Hacke.
biography.name: Meret Becker

biography.bio: Gode Benedix was born in 1962 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor, known for The Counterfeiters (2007), Kokowääh (2011) and Les Trois Mousquetaires (2011).
biography.name: Gode Benedix

biography.bio: Anne-Sophie Briest was born on March 21, 1974 in East Berlin, East Germany. She is an actress, known for Kokowääh (2011), Rabbit Without Ears (2007) and Kokowääh 2 (2013).
biography.name: Anne-Sophie Briest

biography.bio: Samuel Itzhak Finzi was born on January 20, 1966 in Plovdiv. He graduated acting in National Academy for Theatre and Film Art, Sofia, Bulgaria in the class of Professor Dimitrina Gyurova (1992). He specializes in "Lee Strasberg Theater Institute", New York (1994). He debuted in the role of Leopold ("Tutor" - B. Brecht, Y. Lenz) in the Theatre "Bulgarian Army" (1989). Since 1989 he lives and works in Germany. He plays in Toured Hebbel Theater - Berlin, Schauspielhaus - Dusseldorf, Schauspielhaus - Cologne, Thalia Theater - Hamburg (1989 - 2003), Folksbyune - Berlin (2003 - 2006), the Deutsches Theater (2006). His roles are: Cosimo and others ( "Hermafroditus" - performance by director Ivan Stanev); collage of images ( "Performance and Punishment" - by Ivan Stanev); Author, Kalfa ( "Leons and Lena", "Woyzeck" - G. Buchner); Treplyov and several characters, Bortzov ( "Seagull", "Swan songs", "The Big Time" - by Chekhov); Herria ( "Caligula" - A. Camus); Man ( "One month Dachau "- Sorokin); Firs, Charlotte (" The Cherry Orchard "- A. Chekhov); Cortes (" Personal corner "- Yang); Rosenstock (" Wide Side "- A. Schnitzler); collage of characters ( "Germany 3" - H. Muller); several characters ( "Powder Keg" - D. Dukovski), Ivanov ( "Ivanov" - Chekhov); Alburi and other characters ( "Battle of the Negro and dogs "- Koltes); Platonov (" Platonov "- Chekhov); Messenger, Xerxes (" The Persians "- Aeschylus); Volpone (" Volpone "- B. Johnson) and others. He has participated in Bulgarian and German cinema, and of the Pop podium. He is a winner of the German national awards. Samuel Finzi or Sancho, as it is known among his friends, is a true star of the German theater scene. She starred in dozens of feature films - from "The Camp", directed by Georgi Djulgerov and "Pieces of Love", directed by Ivan Tscherkelov to Oscar nominee Austrian film "Testament." Sancho is a pet of the German audience with memorable performances in plays by the most famous world playwrights, Finzi worked for years with Dimitar Gochev, recognized as one of Europe's best theater directors. Bulgarian actor Samuel Finzi was named best actor in Germany. He received high recognition of the 42 known critics and journalists who voted in a poll of the magazine "The theater today." Many of them have indicated Finzi a favorite of the German-speaking scene in 2015 for his role of Vladimir in "Waiting for Godot" by Beckett, staging by another Bulgarian - director Ivan Panteleev, and played in Berlin "Deutsches Theater". Samuel Finzi is married to Sorrel Athina Jardine. They have one child.
biography.name: Samuel Finzi

biography.bio: Jasmin Gerat was born in 1978 in Berlin as daughter of an industrial consultant father and an assurance employee. In 1994 she won the "Girl and BoyContest" of the German Magazine "Bravo". As a result she was offered to work for the German TV station "TM3" as presenter of the show "Heart Attack". About a year later she started to present "Bravo TV" on the German TV station "RTL 2" as successor to Heike Makatsch - a job she quit in 1997. From May 1998 on she is working for MTV Germany as a VJ and doing some acting in the movies and on TV.
biography.name: Jasmin Gerat

biography.bio: Anna Alva was born on July 11, 1985 in Beja, Portugal. She is an actress and producer, known for Kokowääh (2011), Rabenmütter (2016) and Unsichtbare Jahre (2015).
biography.name: Anna Alva

biography.bio: Friederike Kempter was born on August 23, 1979 in Freudental, Baden-Würtemberg, Germany. She is an actress, known for Pandorum (2009), Heiter bis tödlich - Hauptstadtrevier (2012) and A Coffee in Berlin (2012).
biography.name: Friederike Kempter

biography.bio: Torsten Künstler was born in 1969. He is known for his work on Rabbit Without Ears (2007), Kokowääh 2 (2013) and Kokowääh (2011).
biography.name: Torsten Künstler

biography.bio: Miranda Leonhardt was born on September 11, 1975 in Split, Croatia, Yugoslavia as Miranda Condic-Kadmenovic. She is an actress and producer, known for Kokowääh (2011), Zita - Geschichten über Todsünden (1998) and Sex & More (2005).
biography.name: Miranda Leonhardt

biography.bio: Misel Maticevic was born in 1970 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor, known for Le paradis du mac (2002), My Beautiful Country (2012) and Le gang des policiers (2014).
biography.name: Misel Maticevic

biography.bio: Genoveva Mayer is an actress, known for Kokowääh (2011), Adam Meets Eve (2005) and Sources of Life (2013). She has been married to Steffen Wink since May 2013. They have one child.
biography.name: Genoveva Mayer

biography.bio: Sönke Möhring was born on October 12, 1972 in Unna, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. He is an actor, known for Inglourious Basterds (2009), The Impossible (2012) and Koslowski & Haferkamp (2014).
biography.name: Sönke Möhring

biography.bio: Jana Reinermann is an actress, known for Kokowääh (2011), Kokowääh 2 (2013) and Guardians (2012).
biography.name: Jana Reinermann

biography.bio: Jessica Richter was born on September 5, 1985 in Troisdorf, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. She is an actress, known for Rescue Dina Foxx! (2011), Kokowääh (2011) and Willkommen im Krieg (2012).
biography.name: Jessica Richter
